bio.title: Kobe Bryant
bio.description: Kobe Bean Bryant was an American professional basketball player. A shooting guard, he spent his entire 20-year career with the Los Angeles Lakers in the National Basketball Association.
bio.children: Gianna Maria-Onore Bryant, Natalia Diamante Bryant, Bianka Bella Bryant, More
